trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_documentation" name="documentation" href=""></xref> element from XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).
trans-unit.target: Representerar den <xref uid="langword_csharp_documentation" name="documentation" href=""> </xref> element från XML-Schema som anges av World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).

trans-unit.source: This class specifies information to be read or used by humans within an <xref uid="langword_csharp_annotation" name="annotation" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den här klassen anger information för att läsa eller används av människor inom en <xref uid="langword_csharp_annotation" name="annotation" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Information supplied within the `XmlSchemaDocumentation` class is not used in validation.
trans-unit.target: Information som har angetts i den `XmlSchemaDocumentation` klassen används inte i verifieringen.

trans-unit.source: However, it provides a standardized way to supply information that can be retrieved by tools.
trans-unit.target: Det finns dock ett standardiserat sätt att ange information som kan hämtas av verktyg.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDocumentation"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaDocumentation"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_xml:lang" name="xml:lang" href=""></xref> attribute.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den <xref uid="langword_csharp_xml:lang" name="xml:lang" href=""> </xref> attribut.

trans-unit.source: This serves as an indicator of the language used in the contents.
trans-unit.target: Detta fungerar som en indikator på det språk som används i innehållet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNodes" name="XmlNodes" href=""></xref> that represents the documentation child nodes.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger en matris med <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNodes" name="XmlNodes" href=""> </xref> som representerar dokumentationen underordnade noder.

trans-unit.source: The array that represents the documentation child nodes.
trans-unit.target: Matris som representerar dokumentationen underordnade noder.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) source of the information.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger identifierare URI (Uniform Resource) informationskälla.

trans-unit.source: Source must be a URI reference.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_String.Empty" name="String.Empty" href=""></xref>.
